Package com.webfirmframework.wffweb.lang

Class UnicodeString

java.lang.Object
com.webfirmframework.wffweb.lang.UnicodeString
public final class UnicodeString
extends java.lang.Object
An immutable class for unicode based string manipulation.
Since:
3.0.15
